body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Ribbed Knit Long Sleeve Henley Slim Fit T-Shirt
features: SLIM FIT: Close fit that hugs the body.

COTTON MODAL MICRO RIB: Super soft cotton modal micro rib jersey with added stretch offers all-day ease and comfort, while retaining its shape for the perfect slim fit. Long lasting quality. Fabric you want to live in year round.

LAYERING HENLEY T-SHIRT: This versatile t-shirt is a classic wardrobe essential, perfect layered under your favorite jacket or cardigan, or wear on its own with a pair of jeans for easy, everyday style. The slim silhouette gives a flattering fitted look.
DETAILS: Features a v-neck with henley button front closure and long slim sleeves for casual and effortless style.
body.description: Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Blue Comfy, Breathable & Flattering
reviews.reviewText: Have you noticed that ribbed natural fibers stay new looking longer? It clings in just the right places and has a flattering neckline. Price-point is well below “in-store retail” and Amazon quality is excellent. This is the nicest henley I own and have now bought it in blk/Wht stripe, too. My drawers are overflowing w/basics fr Amazon Essentials!! This washes well and looks and behaves more expensive than it is. My other ribbed cotton/blends have been from Target!! My 24yo daughter loves their ribbed tees, too. I normally dress in an “up-scale casual-style.” I wear GOLD Tory Burch jewelry(mixed w/real gold and some Nordy gold pieces, too)TB belts, Tory, MZ Wallace or Gucci shoulder bags(have u seen the NEW MZ WALLACE CROSBY SLING in BLACK LACQUER??), Ugg slip-on sneakers(or Ugg shearling lined boots), WOOL Sneakers(have you seen and FELT these??SO comfy and well made), In the summer I wear Gold metallic Birkenstocks (or silver, gunmetal, patent black & others) in the summer… I shop at the “Mother-Ship” Nordstrom & the Rack. I supplement my wardrobe w/items from Target and Amazon Essentials. Pair it all with either expensive jeans that fit(once I know my size, I shop discount like Poshmark or resale!), cashmere pants, well designed pocketed pull-on Linens(Target!!) and the like. None of it looks “cheap.” My University degree is in Fashion Merch so I humbly am relaying that I KNOW good merch and the value of quality and natural fibers. This long sleeved tee looks and feels quality and I’m very pleased with all aspects of this purchase. I ordered a SMALL- I am 5’4” approx 120lbs (118lbs today)and I’m large chested(34DDD). Even though a size SMALL, this tee does not look OR feel tight due to the fabric blend and ribbing. I am smaller boned and slim but the tee has bits of forgiveness due to the fabric blend and ribbing. The ribbing is fine so it’s not loud or an obvious rib. I trust it will out-last me. What more could I ask for? Happy shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & good quality
reviews.reviewText: I love the material and the fit— so comfortable and complimenting. The shirt has lasted through a few washes now. Good quality too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars FYI. Not black and white striped.
reviews.reviewText: The fit is good and it’s comfortable, but I thought I was buying a black and white striped shirt and this is black and tan/beige. Still keeping it though since it’s still a nice neutral top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Neckline is perfect. Soft. Fitted but not skin tight. Quality seems to be there after several washes. No fading. I reach for this over & over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought this for an Inside Job Halloween costume
reviews.reviewText: So like my title says I bought this so I could dress up as Regan from Inside Job and it was perfect! It’s so comfortable and looks really nice especially for the price! I definitely wouldn’t have been upset if it wasn’t a super soft or super great shirt considering I was buying it for a costume but I actually wear it on the regular now because it’s so comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too big. Wrong color
reviews.reviewText: I bought a Medium like a normally do but it was too big in the bust. Also, the color was off. The pictures make it look solid but when I received I was patterned. And not in a good way. I would have kept but it wasn't what I looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and fits good
reviews.reviewText: I love the material. I got a Large. I am 5' 10" 180 lbs. My bust is 39". I went by the Size guide Large Bust 39-40.5. The shirt is just a tad loose not skin tight which I like. If I sized down to a M then it would be skin tight but the sleeves might not have been long enough for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and perfect fit.

reviews.reviewText: J’adore la qualité de Amazon essentiel .. c’est surprenant

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice and soft and fits perfectly (Small) I am a size 10. Arrived very quickly, would buy again.
Queda un poco demasiado ajustada. La calidad y los acabados están muy bien, como casi todo de Amazon Essencials. Lamentablemente la devolví porque no me gustó cómo me quedaba.

reviews.reviewTitle: Quella non è la porta di casa. Per terra non è piacevole
reviews.reviewText: Il prodotto è ottimo... Mi spiace trovare ciò che ho pagato per terra dietro il cancello! La porta di casa è avanti un metro... a sx, riservato e pianerottolo e gradini al coperto.
..trägt sich angenehm auf der Haut u sieht optisch gut aus.. habe die Shirts mittlerweile in diversen Farben..
